input_args.text: 'NORTH CAROLINA: TRUMP +142,000 OVER ROMNEY EARLY VOTING Mon Nov 07 2016 13:01:41 ET **World Exclusive** Another dramatic turn of events is being reported out of North Carolina this afternoon: Donald Trump has jumped past all expectations in early voting! In 2012, Romney hit Election Day down 447,000 votes, based on early ballots. He went on to win the state by 97,000 votes. Now, the DRUDGE REPORT can reveal, Trump opens Election Day down 305,000!'
